TerrainDef.label: fine beeswax floor
TerrainDef.description: Layers upon layers of carefully laid beeswax, fused with a dab of honey make up this luxurious flooring. \nWhile this flooring takes tremendous effort and wax to build; it's made up for with a gorgeous honey-lavendar scent. \nThis floor is fit for a queen! The incredibly smooth and continuous surface also makes it very easy to clean!
